Circular No. 06/2009 
 
 
Sub : Issue of Airport Entry Pass (AEP) to foreigner(s) 
 
The following instructions shall be adopted for issue of  Airport  Entry Pass: 
 
 
“In case any foreign citizen is required to gain entry to any airport for attending to 
any emergency/ operational requirement an Airport Entry Pass can be issued for 3 days. 
However, such foreigner shall only be provided ‘escorted’ entry - i.e. a valid AEP holder 
of the concerned Airport Operator/ Aircraft Operator/ applying agency shall escort such 
foreigner(s) at all times during visit to the airport. It shall also be ensured by the Airport 
Entry Pass issuing authority that the original passport of the foreigner(s) is retained by the 
pass issuing authority to be returned to the foreigner(s) on deposit of the temporary entry 
permit. 
 
 
This order shall come into force with immediate effect. 
 
 
 
(M. Malaviya) 
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA)
